data.title: DONOVAN'S BRAIN. (Bantam Book # 819 ; Basis for the classic 1953 science fiction film of the same title directed by Felix E. Feist and starring Lew Ayres, Gene Evans, Nancy [Reagan] Davis, and Steve B
data.meta_description: First Edition By This Publisher. - Soft cover - Bantam Books, USA. - 1950 - Condition: Very Good to Fine - 181 pages. Complete & Unabridged. "A young scientist, a lovely woman and a brain with the immortal power of evil." Basis for the classic 1953 science fiction film of the same title directed by Felix E. Feist and starring Lew Ayres, Gene Evans, Nancy [Reagan] Davis, and Steve Brodie. >>Spine slant; Size: 16mo - over 5¾" - 6¾" tall - DONOVAN'S BRAIN. (Bantam Book # 819 ; Basis for the classic 1953 science fiction film of the same title directed by Felix E. Feist and starring Lew Ayres, Gene Evans, Nancy [Reagan] Davis, and Steve Brodie.

Terms of Sale:

We take; Visa, Mastercard,& American Express; For CREDIT CARDS, we highly

recommend sending information, split in to 2 or 3 separate E-Mail's, for safety;

Send emails to = dsulipa@gmail.com (PHONE; 1-204-346-3674); We accept

payment thru PAYPAL [NO need to WRITE first, just send payment to =

dsulipa@gmail.com] >> DIRECT PAYMENT Sometimes saves us money, so

that we are able to accept Surface shipping & often send AIRMAIL instead; ***

We gladly accept MONEY ORDER'S or CERTIFIED BANK CHECKS & DRAFT...
